  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    averageSellByParameters()
    It shows a dialog with a list of parameters, then it shows another dialog with a list of options for the selected parameter, then it shows a message with the average of the selected parameter
    void
    averageSOAT()
    > This function calculates the average of the SOAT value
    void
    averageTax()
    It shows the average of the SOAT value.
    void
    createData()
    It creates a new car object and adds it to the list of cars
    void
    deleteVehicle()
    It deletes a vehicle from the database.
    void
    enterVehicle()
    This function is used to register a vehicle in the system, it has a verification that checks if the vehicle is already registered, if it is, it will show an error message, if it is not, it will register the vehicle
    void
    higherAgeOld()
    It shows the oldest person in the list.
    void
    higherDepretiation()
    It shows the highest depreciation of the vehicles.
    void
    higherTax()
    It shows the highest tax value.
    void
    lowerAgeOld()
    > This function shows the lower age of the old people in the database
    void
    lowerDepretiation()
    This function is used to show the lower depreciation of the vehicle
    void
    lowerTax()
    The function lowerTax() is used to show the user the vehicle with the lowest tax
    static void
    main(String[] args)
    The main function creates a new Presenter object and calls the run function on it
    void
    modifyVehicle()
    The function modifyVehicle() is used to modify the data of a vehicle that has already been registered in the system
    void
    quantityByModels()
    It reads an integer from the user, and then displays the total number of vehicles with a model number equal to or greater than the number entered by the user
    void
    quantityByParameters()
    It shows a dialog menu with the options of the array parameter, then it shows a list dialog with the options of the array colors, carBodyData, citiesData or brands, depending on the option chosen in the dialog menu, then it shows a message dialog with the quantity of the chosen option
    void
    run()
    It shows the menu and depending on the option selected, it calls the corresponding function
    String
    showMenu()
    It shows a menu with a list of options to the user
    void
    totalInformation()
    It shows the information of all the cars registered in the system
    void
    totalSOATByCylinder()
    This function allows the user to enter a cylinder base and the system will show the total value of the SOAT of the vehicles with a greater cylinder than the one entered
    void
    totalTaxByModel()
    It reads an integer from the user, and then displays the total taxes for all cars with a model number greater than or equal to the number entered by the user
    void
    totalTaxesByColor()
    It takes a color from the user, and then it calculates the total taxes for that color

    • showMenu

      public String showMenu()
      It shows a menu with a list of options to the user
      Returns:
      The option that the user has chosen.

    • createData

      public void createData()
      It creates a new car object and adds it to the list of cars

    • enterVehicle

      public void enterVehicle()
      This function is used to register a vehicle in the system, it has a verification that checks if the vehicle is already registered, if it is, it will show an error message, if it is not, it will register the vehicle

    • modifyVehicle

      public void modifyVehicle()
      The function modifyVehicle() is used to modify the data of a vehicle that has already been registered in the system

    • deleteVehicle

      public void deleteVehicle()
      It deletes a vehicle from the database.

    • totalInformation

      public void totalInformation()
      It shows the information of all the cars registered in the system

    • totalTaxesByColor

      public void totalTaxesByColor()
      It takes a color from the user, and then it calculates the total taxes for that color

    • quantityByModels

      public void quantityByModels() throws NumberFormatException
      It reads an integer from the user, and then displays the total number of vehicles with a model number equal to or greater than the number entered by the user
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • higherTax

      public void higherTax()
      It shows the highest tax value.

    • totalTaxByModel

      public void totalTaxByModel() throws NumberFormatException
      It reads an integer from the user, and then displays the total taxes for all cars with a model number greater than or equal to the number entered by the user
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • quantityByParameters

      public void quantityByParameters()
      It shows a dialog menu with the options of the array parameter, then it shows a list dialog with the options of the array colors, carBodyData, citiesData or brands, depending on the option chosen in the dialog menu, then it shows a message dialog with the quantity of the chosen option

    • averageSellByParameters

      public void averageSellByParameters()
      It shows a dialog with a list of parameters, then it shows another dialog with a list of options for the selected parameter, then it shows a message with the average of the selected parameter

    • totalSOATByCylinder

      public void totalSOATByCylinder() throws NumberFormatException
      This function allows the user to enter a cylinder base and the system will show the total value of the SOAT of the vehicles with a greater cylinder than the one entered
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • run

      public void run() throws NullPointerException
      It shows the menu and depending on the option selected, it calls the corresponding function
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main function creates a new Presenter object and calls the run function on it
